title: Visit Tshwane – Tshwane, the mega city capital of South Africa, consists of Pretoria and surrounding areas. Five major highways lead into the City of Tshwane. The city also has its own national airport – Wonderboom airport.
content:
Visit Tshwane – Tshwane, the mega city capital of South Africa, consists of Pretoria and surrounding areas. Five major highways lead into the City of Tshwane. The city also has its own national airport – Wonderboom airport.

Download Tshwane Guide



Tshwane, the mega city capital of South Africa, which lies only 50km from OR Tambo International Airport and is connected to the airport by the Gautrain rapid rail link, consists of Pretoria and surrounding areas. Five major highways lead into the City of Tshwane providing easy access from all over the region. The city also has its own national airport – Wonderboom airport – and is easily and quickly accessible from OR Tambo International Airport and Lanseria National Airport.




Link to: Union Buildings
Union Buildings


Like an ancient temple
the Union Buildings are
a modern day acropolis,
built at the highest point
of the city.
Link to: Dinokeng Game Reserve
Big 5 game reserve


We are the only city in the
world, yes, in the entire
world, that has a Big 5
game reserve within the
city!
Link to: Antique Route 6 Pretoria
Antique route


The coolest antique
route in the country.
From funky furniture to
awesome art visitors
can shop and ship.
Link to: Cullinan
Quaint little town


Just twenty minutes drive
from the Pretoria city
centre is the quaint little
town of Cullinan where
time stood still.


Link to: MapLink to: MapMy Tshwane map


Tshwane is a naturally exciting, cultural and cosmopolitan destination.
Explore Tshwane and start planning your next adventure.

Explore Tshwane

Link to: Union Buildings
Cultural


Tshwane is a cultural
city with grand
architecture, a plethora
of museums – both
historical and modern.
Link to: Dinokeng Game Reserve
African


Tshwane is an African
city boasting two nature
reserves with big game
such as rhino, antelope,
lion and giraffe close to
the city centre.
Link to: Antique Route 6 Pretoria
Cosmopolitan


Tshwane has the most
foreign representative
bodies in the world
after Washington DC.
Link to: Cullinan
Academic, science and research hub


Tshwane has four
universities and no less
than seven national science
councils.







   

City of Excellence Tshwane, the mega city capital of South Africa, consists of Pretoria and surrounding areas. Five major highways lead into the City of Tshwane. The city also has its own national airport – Wonderboom airport.

The TTA The Tshwane Tourism Association (TTA) represents private sector tourism in the City.
Contact the TTA on email at secretary@tshwanetourism.com (Liz) or call +27 (0)84 521 5852

Follow us  Visit our Facebook page for news, info and galleries

How we use cookiesWe may request cookies to be set on your device. We use cookies to let us know when you visit our websites, how you interact with us, to enrich your user experience, and to customize your relationship with our website. 
Click on the different category headings to find out more. You can also change some of your preferences. Note that blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience on our websites and the services we are able to offer.
Essential Website CookiesThese cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with services available through our website and to use some of its features.
Because these cookies are strictly necessary to deliver the website, refusing them will have impact how our site functions. You always can block or delete cookies by changing your browser settings and force blocking all cookies on this website. But this will always prompt you to accept/refuse cookies when revisiting our site.
We fully respect if you want to refuse cookies but to avoid asking you again and again kindly allow us to store a cookie for that. You are free to opt out any time or opt in for other cookies to get a better experience. If you refuse cookies we will remove all set cookies in our domain.
We provide you with a list of stored cookies on your computer in our domain so you can check what we stored. Due to security reasons we are not able to show or modify cookies from other domains. You can check these in your browser security settings.
Check to enable permanent hiding of message bar and refuse all cookies if you do not opt in. We need 2 cookies to store this setting. Otherwise you will be prompted again when opening a new browser window or new a tab.
